html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-13602024-12-16PS, CBSA
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the IMMIGRATION AND REFUGEE PROTECTION REGULATIONS in order to (1) replace the geographic-based fee structure for removals to the United States or St. Pierre and Miquelon ($750) and the fee for removals to elsewhere ($1,500) into a single fee for an unescorted removal cost of $3,840 and an escorted removal cost of $12,880; (2) exempt individuals who are below the age of 18 at the time a removal order was issued against them from the requirement to pay removal costs; and (3) stipulate that foreign nationals subject to escorted land removals would only be responsible to pay the unescorted fee.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2024-0284 Publication Date: 2025-01-01
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations Amending the IMMIGRATION AND REFUGEE PROTECTION REGULATIONS in order to (1) replace the geographic-based fee structure for removals to the United States or St. Pierre and Miquelon ($750) and the fee for removals to elsewhere ($1,500) into a single fee for an unescorted removal cost of $3,840 and an escorted removal cost of $12,880; (2) exempt individuals who are below the age of 18 at the time a removal order was issued against them from the requirement to pay removal costs; and (3) stipulate that foreign nationals subject to escorted land removals would only be responsible to pay the unescorted fee.
